H0.text: Heat is the type of energy that a radiator gives off.

H1.text: Light is the type of energy that a radiator gives off.

H2.text: Solar is the type of energy that a radiator gives off.

H3.text: Electrical is the type of energy a radiator gives off.

A4.text: A radiator is a device that transfers heat to a medium primarily through thermal radiation.
